'''Common Ascension Materials''' are [[Character Development Items]] that are used to ascend [[Characters]] and [[Weapons]] once they have reached their maximum level. These materials can be grouped by the family or type of monster that drops them. Higher-rarity materials can also be [[craft]]ed with [[Alchemy]] by combining lower-rarity materials from the same group.

==General Enemy Drops==
Items in this group can be found by defeating [[Common Enemies]] and some [[Elite Enemies]]. They have a rarity of 1-3 stars and are essential for character and weapon ascension as well as talent leveling.

*In Character Ascension, these items are used along with [[Character Ascension Materials]] and [[Local Specialities]].
*In Weapon Ascension, these items are used along with materials from [[Elite Enemy Drops]] and [[Weapon Ascension Materials]].
*In Talent Leveling, these items are used along with [[Talent Level-Up Materials]].

==Elite Enemy Drops==
